meanings.definition: A contagious viral disease characterized by a pinkish rash on the skin.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed the child with roseolas after noticing the pink rash.
meanings.sent2: Many children recover quickly from roseolas without any complications.
meanings.sent3: The roseolas outbreak at the school caused quite a stir among the parents.
meanings.sent4: The spread of rumors in the small town was like a wave of roseolas infecting everyone.
meanings.sent5: The image of the pink rash from roseolas stayed vivid in the mother's mind.

meanings.definition: A type of flower with fragrant petals in various colors.
meanings.sent1: The garden was filled with beautiful roseolas of different hues.
meanings.sent2: She picked a bouquet of roseolas to brighten up her living room.
meanings.sent3: The bees buzzed happily around the blooming roseolas in the garden.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as sweet and delicate as the scent of roseolas.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the roseolas painted a picturesque scene in the park.
